channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: You can now cheat on your spouse without breaking the law in New York— a century-old adultery ban was just repealed
item.description: No one really knew about it or enforced it anyway.

item.title: S&P 500 is on a 12-month tear, but tariffs threaten 2025 outlook for U.S. stocks

item.title: Trump team prepares to announce Scott Bessent as Treasury pick
item.description: Bessent, 62, served as a key economic adviser to Trump during the campaign, promoting his agenda and crafting policy speeches.

item.title: Trump’s Treasury pick is Scott Bessent, who’s rejected fears of ‘Trump-flation’
Nvidia’s stock surge means CEO’s foundation must double giving
item.description: The Jen-Hsun & Lori Huang Foundation saw its assets, which mostly consist of Nvidia shares, more than triple to $3.4 billion at the end of 2023.

item.title: Hoping for an OpenAI or Anthropic IPO? Here’s why that’s unlikely anytime soon.

item.title: Super Micro’s stock had a historic week — but it’s still 70% off its highs
What’s keeping you from the American dream? For most people, it’s money.
